channel.title: Junos Basics - David Vargas
channel.description: Routing engine = Control Plane OSPF BGP Telenet session Daemons RPD Most important Protocol Routing Protocol Daemon Works with all routing protocols Inet.0 Routing tables MG-D DCD ChassisD VRRPD/ SNMPD Packet forwarding Engine = Forwarding Plane Traffic Line cards (forwarding tables) Switch fabric Junos Software architecture One daemon crashing in the Routing Engine will not crash other Daemons
